name: Donkey Kong 3
overview: Donkey Kong 3 handheld from micro vs system port to zx spectrum using boriel zxbasic compiler. In the greenhouse, Donkey Kong and Stanley fight frantically against bees to defend your garden and each pushes the bees to the side of his rival. Avoid being bitten! Each character has an insecticide sprayer with a three-shot magazine. After exhausting the shots you can reload the sprayer with the drops of insecticide that fall on your back, don't get lost!
